mapper.select: select ss.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ui.password , ss.reminder_volume , ui.last_login_date , ui.phone_number , ss.font_size , ss.system_settings_id , ui.registration_date , ss.questionnaire_exported , ui.username FROM system_settings ss left join user_info ui on ss.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ss.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ui.password , ss.reminder_volume , ui.last_login_date , ui.phone_number , ss.font_size , ss.system_settings_id , ui.registration_date , ss.questionnaire_exported , ui.username FROM system_settings ss left join user_info ui on ss.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ss.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ui.password , ss.reminder_volume , ui.last_login_date , ui.phone_number , ss.font_size , ss.system_settings_id , ui.registration_date , ss.questionnaire_exported , ui.username FROM system_settings ss left join user_info ui on ss.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id where ss.system_settings_id = #{id}
